description:
TENSEI is a very casual endless action game.

In a journey of repeated leaps and descents, you ascend slowly into the sky, like a brush tracing on paper.
TENSEI offers you a moment to leave your busy daily life behind and become mindless.

Play features
[A unique play feel with a sense of floating in low gravity].
Project your consciousness into the game and immerse yourself in the game while relaxing.

[Cleansing of distractions]
Damage zones can be purified by applying a drop (plunge).
Concentrate on your aim and aim high to avoid damage.

[Become a majestic dragon].
Use the 3-step jump to collect orbs (drops of ink) on the field while jumping from one scaffold to another.
name: TENSEI
